bibl.title: La scriptio inferior latina del P.Bodl. I 2 (inv. Gr. bibl. d. 2). Lemmi e flessioni parziali in forma tabulare tra lessico giuridico e Artes grammaticae.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: Autopsy of P. Bodl. I, 2 (= M.-P.3 2997.2; LDAB 6142) has confirmed the existence of the Latin scriptio interior of the 4th century AD, here edited with a commentary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.5 P. Bodl. I, 2, p. 3 (script. inf.); 4-5 (script. inf.); 5 (script. inf.)
Maria Chiara Scappaticcio, La scriptio inferior latina del P.Bodl. I 2 (inv. Gr. bibl. d. 2). Lemmi e flessioni parziali in forma tabulare tra lessico giuridico e Artes grammaticae.
Autopsy of P. Bodl. I, 2 (= M.-P.3 2997.2; LDAB 6142) has confirmed the existence of the Latin scriptio interior of the 4th century AD, here edited with a commentary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
